key_risks: Raw material dependency leading to supply chain disruptions and price volatility

sources.title: Sustainability - Oil-Dri Corporation of America
sources.snippet: Our mining team manages detailed geological, environmental, habitat, and wetland assessments before breaking ground. Quality-control drilling and sample testing are conducted for all active mine sites to qualify the material for various products and to develop detailed mining plans.

sources.title: Responsibility - Oil-Dri Corporation of America
sources.snippet: Effective environmental management and a commitment to environmentally responsible and sustainable practices are key corporate priorities for Oil-Dri Corporation of America. We are committed to constantly improving and optimizing efficiencies in our manufacturing operations while meeting or exceeding our environmental commitments.
sources.query_context: Oil-Dri Corporation of America Oil-Dri Corporation of America environmental impact of mining operations

sources.title: Reclamation - Oil-Dri Corporation of America
sources.snippet: Oil-Dri has always demonstrated a strong commitment to mining sustainability and reclamation. During the normal course of our process, we remove the overburden, or top-soil, exposing the valuable clay to prepare for mining. As overburden is removed from a mine site, it is hauled to a previously mined location and used to refill older sites.
